summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4778 for the improvement of the alley in block 3, Fern Hill Addition and block 4, Wabash Addition, being the alley in block bounded by 46th Avenue Southwest, Erskine Way, West Hudson Street, and Heinze Way; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55227, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
